item.title: By: itnorthwest.org » Widgets Live Lighting Demos
item.dc:creator: itnorthwest.org » Widgets Live Lighting Demos
item.description: [...] Infacta are at the inaugural WidgetsLive conference in San Francisco today. We’ve been lucky enough to get a chance to demo our PollDaddy service. As part of that demo we are going to show a PollDaddy Widget in use, live on stage (so fingers crossed!). We are going to do the demo using the Web2ireland.org blog - so please check it out and vote when you get a chance. [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] Infacta are at the inaugural WidgetsLive conference in San Francisco today. We’ve been lucky enough to get a chance to demo our PollDaddy service. As part of that demo we are going to show a PollDaddy Widget in use, live on stage (so fingers crossed!). We are going to do the demo using the Web2ireland.org blog – so please check it out and vote when you get a chance. [...]
